1.title: Ren is the New Black
1.plot: When Cynthia Ren's crime syndicate returns; it's up to Amanda and Mitch to figure out how to stop the fraud; the woman responsible for Preston's father's death is getting of prison.

2.title: Diagnosis: Negative
2.plot: Mitch and Amanda learn of a double billing fraud involving patient's insurance that lead to excessive payments. While working the case they discover Preston may be one of those victimized.

3.title: The Dog House
3.plot: A grocery store that deals with a high volume of postal orders is robbed. Mitch and Amanda are on the case but find themselves following false clues. Preston and Veronica fall asleep during Noah's play but are afraid to tell him.

4.title: Scam School
4.plot: Amanda and Mitch find out there are instructional facilities that teach college students how to commit scams. In order to break the case they receive unexpected help from Noah.

5.title: Shields and Potions
5.plot: After a post office branch is held up Amanda and Mitch are determined to solve the case. Preston and Veronica help Noah out when he enter a tournament involving his favorite game Shields and Potions.

6.title: What's in a Name
6.plot: A student is discovered using false identification. The reasons why and who the person really is becomes the focus of the investigation.

7.title: Smells Like Christmas Spirit.
7.plot: Amanda and Mitch take on a case of a holiday charity misrepresenting where the donations are being used. Preston and his friends agree to dog sit a puppy but suspect the owner of bad treatment of the canine.

8.title: Smile Like You Mean It
8.plot: Mitch and Amanda are on the case after several mailboxes are rigged to explode. Noah is going through a series of life changing experiences with Preston and Veronica being supportive of their friend.

9.title: Blank Canvas... of Corruption
9.plot: A dangerous chemical is part of a postal shipment of makeup which put Amanda and Mitche on the case. Preston and Veronica join Noah to help out his aunt but encounter trouble that leaves them tied up.

10.title: Turtle Trouble Beach Party
10.plot: Endangered turtles are being sent through the mail leading to an investigation by Mitch and Amanda. Pres and his pals head off for vacation but Preston becomes jealous because of Veronica's new boyfriend.

12.title: Hurtful Words
12.plot:

13.title: Senior Week
13.plot: A major jewelry robbery occurs at the airport with Amanda and Mitch being called in to find the stolen diamonds. Veronica is having a rough time getting over her latest breakup, Preston and Noah attempt to help her out of her funk.

14.title: Diner Dash
14.plot: Amanda and Mitch take jobs at a cafe to try and apprehend a crime family suspected in a jewel robbery. Noah is eager to take on a escape room challenge, persuading Pres and Veronica to join him in the experience.

15.title: Sticker Shock
15.plot: Amanda and Mitch find themselves pursuing an unusual case when a young girl is exposed to a deadly toxin. Preston is excited to volunteer for a political campaign until his assignment is to watch the candidate's son.

16.title: Making Chemistry

1.title: Krackin' Kards
1.plot: Students are being conned out of money through debit cards with a scheme that is called Crackin' Cards.

2.title: Elephant in the Room
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: The Long Shot
3.plot: Preston helps his best friend Noah as he tries to make a half-court shot to win a $50,000 scholarship. Meanwhile, Amanda goes after a psychic who scammed a family friend.

4.title: Final Distraction
4.plot: Preston meets a cute girl at school, but she proves overbearing. Meanwhile, Amanda searches for a con artist who lies to elderly victims about winning the lottery and tricks them into sending him checks.

5.title: The Slow & the Furious
5.plot: Tommy files first tax return and gets flagged by IRS. Preston convinces Noah to let Veronica use his car for her driver's license retest.

6.title: Semper Phi
6.plot: Amanda and Mitch are determined to find whoever is defrauding grieving families of military members. Noah and Preston try to pledge a fraternity and Pres objects to any favorable treatment because he's in a wheelchair.

7.title: The Heart Is a Lonely Scammer
7.plot: Amanda connects with someone online who is using subterfuge to scam lonely types on a dating site. Preston tries out for the school's archery team and thinks he made it but the coach states his disability won't allow it.

8.title: We Take Care of Our Own
8.plot: Franklin rescues a fellow carrier being viciously assaulted, but the criminal escapes. Mitch, Amanda and Franklin work with a sketch artist to find him. Preston reluctantly tutors Veronica's boyfriend athlete Brian but learns he cheats.

9.title: Threatening Letters
9.plot: Amanda and Mitch lead the investigation into the menacing mail the dean at Jamestown University is receiving. Veronica moves from her parent's home so Preston and Noah help her but her new lodgings are on the scary side.

10.title: Arrivederci Milo's
10.plot: Inspectors Amanda and Mitch must move fast when someone targets medical staffers when deadly envelopes of Ricin. Preston and Noah learn of the proposed closing of their college's hangout so they lead a group to stop it.

11.title: Jersey Blues
11.plot: Preston's friend Noah wants the perfect birthday gift for his dad, a sports fanatic. Noah buys a signed Marino jersey from dealer Mr. Ellison. Amanda and Mitch are currently investigating Ellison for defrauding collectors.

12.title: Noah's Story Arc
12.plot: Noah films Preston for a movie and Amanda and Mitch catch a criminal red-handed with surveillance tactics.

13.title: Fast Tracking
13.plot: Mitch, Amanda, and their postal team have a tough investigation involving money order fraud. Preston tries out for the university debate team but gets off on the wrong foot with Dr. Dennis, the coach, who finds Preston difficult.

14.title: Storm Chasers
14.plot: Mitch and Amanda pose as a married couple who lost their home because of weather. The idea is to ensnare someone defrauding storm victims. Preston's expensive race wheelchair is stolen so Noah and Veronica help in a plan for it's recovery.

15.title: 30 Days
15.plot: Postal inspectors Wainwright and Ohlmeyer investigate someone bilking people out of their savings in a pyramid scheme. Preston, Noah, and Veronica discover it affects student Carl Gonzalez and become involved keeping him in school.

16.title: Too Good to Be True
16.plot: Amanda and Mitch investigate a claim by Nora Maxwell that her investment adviser Michael Winderson has defrauded her. Veronica's co-worker Amanda has her suspicious so she, Preston, and Noah do their own sleuthing regarding stolen identity.

17.title: Identity
17.plot: Inspectors Amanda and Mitch meet with Franklin Barry who explains how his identity was stolen. They target Tyler Bristol who is living above his means. Veronica returns to old boyfriend Dallas but Preston learns he's still cheating on her.

18.title: Gone Phishing
18.plot: Amanda and Mitch go after an expert in identity theft. Preston, Noah and Veronica auction themselves to do chores for charity but then feel that the winning bidder Becky is taking advantage of them.

19.title: Psychic Rabbit
19.plot: Amanda and Mitch learn of a scam involving debt collection but the perpetrator Ian Gaffney proves elusive. Preston, Noah, and Veronica team up for the college talent show but artistic differences break up the act.

20.title: No Good Deed
20.plot: Amanda and Mitch learn of a charity fraud raising money that is pocketed by the scammers. Amanda has an idea of a fake award to locate them. Preston is a consultant on a film and the star Kelly takes a liking to him.

21.title: Jamaican Lottery
21.plot: Veronica sings the National Anthem at a Jamestown University basketball game and Amanda and Mitch investigate a lottery scam.

22.title: More Than a Feeling
22.plot: Veronica goes abroad and Preston tries to confess his feelings for her before she leaves. Elsewhere: Amanda investigates a suspect who is scamming a local church.

1.title: Veronica Returns
1.plot: Mitch and Amanda track armed robbers of remote post offices with only a woman's neck tattoo as a clue. Preston improves slightly through physical therapy. Veronica gets back from Italy with Preston wondering about their romantic future.

2.title: Casey Gets Pinned
2.plot: Preston's friend Casey looks to be a lock for a wrestling championship but then collapses at practice. Pres finds a steroids in his bag and ask mom Amanda to investigate. She and Mitch learn the illegal drugs are being sent through the mail.

3.title: A Sweater for Phil
3.plot: Mitch and Amanda are having difficulty locating the person who seems to have a master key to post office boxes then steals the contents. Noah is interested in waitress Amy but gets contradictory dating advice from Preston and Veronica.

4.title: The Art of Stand Up
4.plot: Amanda and Mitch target art fraud that is using the mail and a gallery owned by David Vaughn may be involved. Preston decides to try stand up comedy but his jokes flop with Noah and Veronica being less then supportive.

5.title: The One That Got Away
5.plot: Amanda is frustrated that fraudster Chris resides in another country but then she learns he might have returned to DC. Preston has trouble opening up in his group therapy and is angry about his future. Amanda is offered a promotion.

6.title: The Great Postal Truck Robbery
6.plot: When masked men rob a postal truck plus assault an employee, Mitch and Amanda have few clues to go on. Veronica, Preston, and Noah help Kristen, who's denied an opportunity to try out for the football team because of her gender.

7.title: Dangerous Delivery
7.plot: Mitch and Amanda take the case of Jocelyn who has received a very threatening letter. A minor clue has them focusing on her employees. Noah leaves town and forbids Veronica from driving his car which she disregards to bad results.

8.title: The Return of Ronnie
8.plot: Someone using the mail in a sweepstakes scam leads Mitch and Amanda to suspect Ronnie Lawson who's done this before. Preston and Veronica are bothered to discover a photographer is photo shopping their heads to new bodies.

9.title: Wedding Bell Blues
9.plot: Mitch and Amanda fake being a couple to catch a woman who is fraudently planning weddings using the mail. Amanda is asked out by Professor Rice making Preston uncomfortable with his mother beginning to date after his father's death.

10.title: Faking It
10.plot: An eBay fraudster attempts to obtain major league baseball bats from a bat manufacturer, put pine tar on the bats with ball marks and sell them on eBay as game used bats of two major league baseball players.

11.title: Mistaken Identities
11.plot: Robberies at a postal facilities are filmed and the suspect appears to be a homeless man. When apprehended Mitch and Amanda learn he's a front for the actual criminal.

12.title: Man Overboard
12.plot: Amanda and Mitch investigate the increasing number of counterfeit money orders. But their chief suspect is supposedly dead. Preston runs for student body president on a single issue which causes Veronica to support another candidate.

13.title: The Bus Stops Here
13.plot: An insurance scam surfaces that involves bus accidents and people pretending to be hurt. Elsewhere: Preston's first girlfriend visits.

14.title: Bribe and Prejudice
14.plot: Mitch and Amanda have a case involving the carriers targeted for valuable jewelry in their mail. An crime family may be behind it. Preston gets an interview with a famed reclusive writer but his tough professor doesn't believe him.

15.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
15.plot: Mitch and Amanda look into vacation scams where people arrive at their destinations but nowhere to stay after prepaying. Amanda worries about her promotion. The University bell is disappears leading Preston, Veronica, and Noah to investigate.

16.title: Spring Breakers
16.plot: Mitch and Amanda learn of a mimic deceptively sell sports memorabilia and set up a sting operation to catch their man. Noah and Preston assist Veronica in helping city kids during spring break but their competitive nature erupts over a chess match.

17.title: Birds Eye View
17.plot: After a rare parrot is intercepted Mitch and Amanda delve into the world of exotic animal trafficking. Noah is injured and learns about Preston's life when confined briefly to a wheelchair. Preston is devastated to learn him may never walk again.

18.title: It's a Wash
18.plot: Mitch and Amanda are on the trail of an expert forger who alters money orders then uses the mail to get them cashed. Preston takes up the cause of an injured athlete who may lose his scholarship. Veronica learns Pres may never walk again.

19.title: Trial by Error
19.plot: Amanda and Mitch are on a case of a construction company receiving threatening letters when Mitch opens an envelope with powder. Preston's class assignment is a mock trial where he's defending a position he doesn't believe in.

20.title: The Friend You Know
20.plot: Mitch and Amanda uncover widespread cases of identity theft, many involving Jamestown University students. Noah and Preston are jealous that Veronica has plenty of free time while they spend every moment studying.

21.title: Major Decision
21.plot: Mitch and Amanda investigate bogus invoices that have been arriving at the Jamestown University bookstore in a mail fraud scheme. It's time for major declaration with Preston sure of his choice while Noah and Veronica have doubts about their future.

22.title: It's Complicated
22.plot: Mitch and Amanda's newest case involves identity theft among senior citizens. Mitch enlisteds Noah's help in making a tribute to Amanda if she takes the promotion. Preston pushes both Veronica and his mom away to show his independence.

1.title: Welcome Back
1.plot: Mitch and Amanda listen as a man says his invention was stolen by a patent assistance company. The team investigate and meet a very smooth Eric King. Preston worries about his grade after his mom breaks up with Professor Price.

2.title: Teacher's Pet
2.plot: Science teacher Olive is bitten by a poisonous snake sent in mail. Amanda and Mitch learn her reputation as a tough grader leaves many suspects including Noah. Pres bonds with Kendall who loves archery and is in a wheelchair making Veronica jealous.

3.title: Hospital Hacks
3.plot: When a hospital has private information stolen the use of mail to ask for money bring Mitch and Amanda onto the case. A new employee has the computer skills to help them. Veronica is nervous when auditioning for a weather reporting position.

4.title: Surveillance 101
4.plot: When a postal carrier is brutally assaulted by a gang Mitch and Amanda are assigned to the case. Preston assists his dad's friend Joel in reviewing camera footage. Veronica seeks to help troubled student Jimmy in her new advising position.

5.title: The Initiation
5.plot: Mitch and Amanda are brought in when mailboxes are being destroyed. They focus on a fraternity in the belief it was a a pledge prank but also retaliatory in nature. Preston is bullied at his new gym and fights back which gets him banished.

6.title: Meet Sam
6.plot: Mitch's niece Sam visits and notices Amanda's pricey birthday gift is a knockoff. Since it was a postal delivery Mitch and Amanda investigate. Preston and his friends are suspicious of Sam's behavior especially when a necklace goes missing.

7.title: Mitch Knows Best
7.plot: Mitch and Amanda work on a case of a predator using the postal system to meet underage girls. Sam is annoyed by her Uncle Mitch's protectiveness but Preston learns it's necessary as she's meeting a stranger she met online.

8.title: The Christmas Special
8.plot: Mitch and Amanda use tracking devices and surveillance to bust a gang stealing packages off front porches. Veronica, Noah, and Preston find a letter from 1962 and decide to locate the recipient as part of Operation Santa.

9.title: Stop the Presses
9.plot: The publisher of a newspaper is kidnapped and the demands are sent through the mail. That brings Amanda and partner Eric on the case where they try to find which recent story made someone take such drastic action.

10.title: The Henry Wainwright Foundation
10.plot: Amanda mentors a visiting inspector Eric Lin as they solve a case involving postal box robberies. Preston, Noah, and Veronica travel to West Virginia to ask the band 21 Monkeys to play a benefit concert but Noah's shortcut becomes a bad idea.

11.title: That Moment When
11.plot: A clueless housewife accepts deliveries of illegal goods leading Amanda and Eric to enlist her help. But Chloe surprises the agents in her savvy while wearing a wire. Veronica gets her feelings hurt by Preston when he posts a meme about her.

12.title: Curtain Call
12.plot: Renowned opera singer Isabella Novak receives a threat through the mail putting Amanda and Mitch on the case. A lip imprint may be the break they need. Preston ignores Veronica's no Valentine gift request leaving her scrambling for one.

13.title: Jamai-Can
13.plot: Mitch and Amanda head to Jamaica working with local police to catch a postal scammer that they've been after. Veronica wants to win a charity drive contest leading her to put Preston and Noah against each other.

14.title: Noah's Near Miss
14.plot: Noah doesn't believe his classes at Jamestown are preparing him for his future as a filmmaker. He drops out to attend an expensive art school not knowing Amanda and Mitch are investigating the institution for mail fraud.

15.title: Window Washers
15.plot: Preston is staying at an uncle's NYC condo that is subject to sporadic power. Having viewed a Hitchcock classic he entertains himself by watching other apartments. But after witnessing a check washing operation his life becomes endangered.

16.title: All About V
16.plot: Postal employee Ray (Brian Clackley) alerts Mitch and Amanda that Veronica's grandmother Marisol is sending large amounts of cash to an unknown person. She has also become forgetful which the family learns after her bank account has been drained.

17.title: Cat in a Coal Mine
17.plot: The Inspectors investigate a synthetic opioid case when one of their own accidentally comes into contact with a dangerous substance. Meanwhile, Veronica is worried about an upcoming chemistry exam, and her study partner offers her a boost that he thinks could help.

18.title: Grampa's Gumbo
18.plot: Mitch, with his military background, takes personally a scam concerning veteran's funerals. Amanda with Mitch tracks the man taking the family's funds. Newly widowed Grampa Waldman is upset when Noah's girlfriend joins them for a family event.

19.title: Witness Intimidation
19.plot: A robbery witness is threatened about testifying through the mail, involving the inspectors. A partial fingerprint may help break the case. Preston and Veronica participate in a charity event revealing truths about their relationship.

20.title: Counterfeit Culture
20.plot: A look back at an unusual case that the Inspectors investigated involving counterfeit goods.

21.title: Family Reunion: Part One
21.plot: The Inspectors go the coast to help with hurricane recovery; Preston, Noah and Veronica volunteer in an emergency shelter; Preston is pushed to his limit when h ventures off alone to find a missing girl.

22.title: Blast Off
22.plot: When a man is set free the crime is considered a cold case. Amanda decides to look at the evidence. Preston is on the Honor Council at Jamestown and they must determine if a student should be suspended but that person is Veronica.

23.title: Family Reunion: Part Two
23.plot: Preston locates the missing girl but must whether the storm until help arrives; Noah and Veronica help the Inspectors with their rescue.

-1.title: Mother Nature
-1.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Set in Washington, D.C., "The Inspectors" is inspired by real cases handled by the United States Postal Inspection Service. Preston Wainwright is a teenager who doesn't let the paralysis he incurred in a car accident hold him back, and he enjoys working as an intern for his postal inspector mother, Amanda. Together they solve crimes, including Internet scams. The show endeavors to educate young people about making good choices and the importance of communicating with parents and includes a positive message about living with a disability.
imdb.title: The Inspectors
plot: Amanda Wainwright is a single mom who works as a US Postal Inspector while son Preston is a forensics lab intern. Amanda's partner is Mitch who helps deliver a message after each case is solved.

Set in Washington, D.C., "_The Inspectors_ (qv)" is inspired by real cases handled by the United States Postal Inspection Service. Preston Wainwright is a teenager who doesn't let the paralysis he incurred in a car accident hold him back, and he enjoys working as an intern for his postal inspector mother, Amanda. Together they solve crimes, including Internet scams. The show endeavors to educate young people about making good choices and the importance of communicating with parents and includes a positive message about living with a disability.::Jwelch5742
